metadata.title: CVE-2023-1972 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.description:
A potential heap based buffer overflow was found in_bfd_elf_slurp_version_tables() in bfd/elf.c. This may lead to loss ofavailability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-1972` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gdb - 9.2-0ubuntu1~20.04.2
gdb-multiarch - 9.2-0ubuntu1~20.04.2
gdb-source - 9.2-0ubuntu1~20.04.2
gdbserver - 9.2-0ubuntu1~20.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gdb package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '9.2-0ubuntu1~20.04.2').
